reviewText: Crossan is a compelling speaker, and always a joy to listen to. I would go a long way to hear him. However, I can't help thinking that, while Jesus was certainly concerned with justice, this boy who gets an audience with Crossan has been given a little short shrift. Jesus had plenty more to say than that, and the boy was certainly mature enough to absorb it.

This is a conversation/interview with a young person
that seems of limited interest to someone of any
age. I'm not sure why John Dominic Crossan made
this DVD
